body.name: Micol Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, Household Stick Vacuum, 2 Modes of Powerful Suction, up to 38 Mins Runtime, Removable Battery, Lightweight Vacuum Cleaner for Home Hard Floor Car Pet Hair
features: ✨【38 Mins Runtime & 2200mAh Detachable Battery】Micol cordless stick vacuum ensures thorough cleaning of the whole house without any cord entanglement. The removable battery can be charged singly or on its main body. This cordless stick cleaner is equipped with LED headlights to easily track dust and debris in dark places.

✨【Dual Motor Cordless Vacuum】Micol rolling brush for cordless vacuum cleaner is driven by an independent 30W electric motor, in-depth blanket cleaning. With the use of the handle motor, the dual motors drive at the same time, and the cleaning effect is stronger. it provides 2X more power and 80% stronger cleaning performance than ordinary cordless vacuums.

✨【5-Stage High-Efficient Filtration】5-stage fully sealed cyclone filtration system easily captures 99.99% of fine dust as small as 0.1 microns and discharges purified clean air to avoid secondary pollution. Plus, the cordless vacuum cleaner has one-touch emptying of the bin, keeping your hands free of dirt! (HEPA filter is washable and reusable).

✨【6 in 1 Multifunctional Combinations】6-in-1 flexible combination, sweeping the whole house with one cordless vacuum cleaner. Swivels 180° sideways and swivels 90° up and down; stiff/soft bristles are integrated on a tangle-free roller that rolls up dirt and is perfect for protecting various surfaces.

✨【Wall Mountable Storage】The wall mountable storage design can easily store the cleaner whilst charging it up for the next use, keeping your home tidy and organized. Ultra-quiet operation sound(<68 dB) avoids annoying noise, friendly to your baby and pet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good vacuum
reviews.reviewText: Didnt know what to expect for the cost, but am beyond satisfied so far. Works well on hard floors as well as area rugs. The light on the front helps a lot too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Right Price compare to others
reviews.reviewText: Nice handheld vacuum. It has many pieces for flexibility. I was worry first since the brand was not as recognizable as the other one, but it did meet my expectations. It is lite to carry around and it has a decent power suction. It even has a light so I can see in tight corners. It was between this unit and the more expensive Dyson model, but after comparing $100+ vs $500+ it was a no brainer. The price point was great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Vacuum is Perfect!
reviews.reviewText: This product is so well designed!! It was a breeze to assemble and comes apart in all of the placed that makes sense. The battery is removeable so you don't have to have the whole thing laying out while it's charging. The cup is so easy to clean and the roller is well exposed so it's a simple process to remove hair that gets caught. My favorite part might be wall-mountable storage bracket. I was able to mount it on the inside of our coat closet and it's so close to the wall that it's barely noticeable. It's also very secure so I'm not concerned about it accidentally falling off while my kids go to get their coats. If you are constantly having to vacuum up little messes, or even big ones, but getting the vacuum out is just too much of a hassle, look no further. This is what you need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Very Little suction
reviews.reviewText: I’ve followed directions front to back and re-read many times. Hard to take apart & harder to put back together. If your dog has lots of long hair, do not buy this!! You get what you pay for. Cheap!! Not again..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got it for my hard floors. I have one dog and two cats the fur is crazy. This vaccum is awesome the light let's me see the hair, it's quiet, and I tried it on carpet IT WORKS ! definitely good if you can't afford the big name brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I have a 9 month old so I need to do a quick sweep through daily and getting out the regular vacuum is a real pain. This is light, no cord so you can rip through a room really quick. For actual cleaning I use the regular vacuum. But so far this little thing is worth $55

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum cleaner isn’t just pretty but it works so good and it’s very versatile. I reached under my bed with it and that was a game changer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Aun no la eh usado llego rapido les contare cuando la use pero seve buena calidad

Ich benutze den Staubsager nun schon seit einer Woche täglich und finde ihn super.Der Staubsauger ist ein beutelloser sehr handlicher Staubsauger ohne nerviges Kabel.Die Saugkraft ist optimal und das Licht hilft einem auch wirklich alles zu sehen, egal wie die Lichtverhältnisse im Raum sind.Er rollt super einfach über den Boden und selbst Teppiche lassen sich problemlos saugen, ohne dass dieser sich vom Fleck bewegt.Die Akkulaufzeit ist sehr gut und sehr leicht aufzuladen.Die Vorrichtung ist optimal zur Aufbewahrung, egal wo, da man den Staubsauger auch hinlegen kann.Einfache Reinigung, da sichtbar ist, wie voll er ist.Die verschiedenen Aufsätze ermöglichen das Saugen auch in schwierigeren Ecken.Fazit: Ein Staubsauger für Jedermann, unkompliziert und optisch schön!

ich war mir nicht sicher ob ich einen Staubsauger brauche oder nicht .Da erstens meine Wohnung nicht groß ist , zweitens es nicht so dreckig ist . Nach einer Länge Diskussion mit meinen Wohnungen sind wir auf diese Staubsauger gekommen . es ist sehr flexibel and kann man irgendwann und irgendwo (mobile Staubsauger habe ich gemeint ) benutzen .Leistung ist in Ordnung aber die Geräusche von Motor sind ein bisschen laut . Für mich persönlich reicht mir 38 min aus wie gesagt meine Wohnung ist nicht groß , aber Sie sollten daran denken ob sie die 35 min ausreichend sind oder nicht .

Halloehrlich gesagt war ich anfangs sehr skeptisch aber das wurde schnell gelegt,Das Gerät hat eine sehr gute Saugleistung und sieht gut aus:)es ist eine Wanhalterung dabei und der Akku hält sehr langehab jetzt einmal damit das haus gesaugt und da war der Akku noch immer am laufenwerd jetzt noch ein bisschen testen, aber bisher macht er einen sehr guten Eindruck bei Fragen könnt ihr gerne Fragen:)
Sehr guter Sauger. Wir haben einen Hund und hatten mit unserem alten Sauger grosse Probleme. Tierhaare sind nun kein Problem mehr. Klare Kaufempfehlung auch wegen der langen Akkulaufzeit.
Quality vacuum with decent price I’ve ever bought. It works exactly as expected.
